name: Longest Increasing Subsequence
problem-statement: You are given an array of n numbers arr[0], . . . , arr[n-1]. A subsequence is any subset of these numbers taken in order, of the form arr[i0], arr[i1], ... , arr[ik] where 0 <= i0 < i1 < · · · < ik < n, and an increasing subsequence is one in which the numbers are getting strictly larger. The goal of the problem is to find the increasing subsequence of greatest length.

output.result: The length of the longest increasing subsequence
output.solution: The indices of the elements in longest increasing subsequence
